entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • So what is sendbuffersize supposed to do? seems like its just thrown away #98527
  • Large Memory Consumption in Docker Causing OOM #98524
  • [wasm] perf/aot regression in Normalize ASCII #98522
    9.0.0
  • Validate ILLink support for ref structs within generics #98519
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: ICollection<> AddRange / RemoveRange #98509
  • Excessive exceptions generated in StackTraceSymbols when using Portable PDB #98506
  • WasmEnableThreads incrementalism is broken #98502
    9.0.0
  • Unhandled exception. System.Exception: Profilee returned exit code 139 instead of expected exit code 100 #98500
  • `DiagnosticSource` Filtering Behaviour #98499
  • Blocking scheme changes between 302 redirects #98497
  • [NativeAOT/arm32] punning test failure in Checked build #98493
  • Call to extension yield method is ignored if the returned values are discarded. #98489
  • [browser][WBT] DownloadResourceProgressTests.DownloadProgressFinishes #98486
    9.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Buffers.Tests.ReadOnlySequenceTests #98507
  • Regressions in System.MathBenchmarks #98505
  • [browser][MT] hybrid globalization #98483
    9.0.0
  • Stackoverflow on macOS x64 hangs #98477
  • Random.Shuffle fails on covariant array #98470

Closed

  • Blocking scheme changes between 302 redirects #98523
  • Building ILC causes double writes in the runtime build #89763
    9.0.0
  • possibly memory leak in .net 8 #96581
  • [android] .NET Preview 2, AOT w/ LLVM fails with `mini-llvm.c:8581, condition elems <= MAX_VECTOR_ELEMS / 2' not met` #98501
    9.0.0
  • Add benchmarks for TensorPrimitives #98369
    9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] WasmEnableThreads=true should fail without workload installed #98496
    9.0.0
  • Unified Build control update - runtime #74819
    9.0.0
  • [BUG] Cancellation token doesn't seem to respect the cancellation times #98452
  • Writing to `StreamWriter.Null` can cause exceptions #98457
    9.0.0
  • Decompression handler is case-sensitive #98236
    9.0.0
  • [browser][mt] Stop using ThreadlessXunitTestRunner for MT unit tests #88763
    9.0.0
  • JIT: CSE for passthrough nodes CQ issue #98413
    9.0.0
  • .net 8.0.1 but reports 8.0.0 on arm 32 #97250
  • https://github.com/dotnet/runtime/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md #98478
  • Calling RequestReJIT in the profiler API can cause a deadlock #97771
    9.0.0
  • Tests crashing in CI with no dump: exit code 137 means SIGKILL Killed #97049
    9.0.0
  • Use IBC to Drive Partial NGEN and Tiered Compilation Behavior #10581
    Future
  • Implement Session-based Filtering for EventSource #11435
    Future
  • valgrind reports definitely lost bytes #11920
    Future
  • Performance regression: Span<Int32>.SequenceCompareTo 33% slower on x86 #13153
    Future
  • Process.WaitForExitAsync does not return when awaited process is killed if output is redirected #98347

PullRequests

Created

  • Update linux musl arm32 helix image to Alpine 3.17 #98531
    needs-area-label
  • [wasm] New jiterpreter backbranch scan pass #98530
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • JIT: Move isinst<exact> casts to the late phase #98528
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Refactor Compiler::optRedirectBlock; remove BasicBlock::CopyTarget #98526
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • FabricBot: Onboarding to GitOps.ResourceManagement because of FabricBot decommissioning #98525
    area-Meta
  • enable regions for MacOS #98521
    NO-MERGE, area-GC-coreclr
  • [mono][wasm] Fix a performance regression introduced by #97096. #98515
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [mono] Intrinsify multiple StoreVector API's #98514
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add correct ImplementingType to DIM cache in TypeMapInfo #98513
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • Delete suppressions against resolved issues #98512
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Fix some generic math DIMs to have the correct behavior #98510
    area-System.Numerics
  • [wasm][mt] Guard more places for blocking wait on JS interop threads #98508
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Move out globalization code from runtime #98495
    area-System.Globalization, runtime-mono, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] [browser] Fix debugger support #98494
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 8.0.x
  • [browser] Run tests in parallel #98492
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Test On CI System.Runtime.TrimmingTests #98488
    NO-REVIEW, area-Build-mono
  • [browser][mt] Don't allow relink duplicates of `dotnet.native.worker.js` #98487
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono
  • More precise writebarrier for regions #98485
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Remove unnecessary assertion from emitOutputInstr #98484
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-riscv
  • Update SDK to preview 1 release #98476
    area-Infrastructure
  • Add backtracking stack imbalance detection to regex source generator #98472
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Fix Random.Shuffle covariance #98471
    area-System.Runtime

Merged

  • Remove C FILE PAL wrappers #98238
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Expose AVX512F embedded rounding intrinsics. #97415
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fix problem with fgExpandQmarkForCastInstOf #97493
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix debug info emitted for VLT_STK_REG/VLT_FPSTK variable locations #98479
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/6.0-staging] Manually depad RSAES-PKCS1 on Apple OSes #98465
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, 6.0.x
  • Change GetNameInfo early return to linear flow #98504
    area-System.Security, 9.0.0
  • Avoid double writes to PDB in NAOT publish #98342
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Inline TLS access for linux/arm64 #97910
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] Move reflection from JS to C# #98391
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • X509Chain.Build should throw when an internal error occurs #98435
    area-System.Security, 9.0.0
  • Fold "cast(cast(obj, cls), cls)" to "cast(obj, cls)" #98337
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Reintroduce case sensitive comparison optimization for FrozenDictionary in some cases #95232
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • [wasm][workload] Require the workload for wasm threading #98498
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser
  • Vectorize TensorPrimitives.Tan #98299
    area-System.Numerics
  • Update unified build controls #98330
    area-Infrastructure
  • [NativeAOT] Fix shift math helpers to mask the shift operand #98481
    arch-arm32, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Make all StreamWriter.Null operations nops #98473
    area-System.IO
  • [browser][wbt] Print build info and ensure wasmEnableThreads is true in Blazor MT WBT #98490
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Free var_values table later #98482
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Make SocketsHttpHandler's content encoding comparison case-insensitive #98475
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [browser] Use standard xunit test runner on multithreaded runtime #91317
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Fix "bump-chrome-pr.env" update. #98480
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • JIT: Discard simple dominated CSEs that will never be defs #98417
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Simplify formatting strings for various "reason" fields #98434
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix deadlock when we request a ReJIT due to an inlined method #98400
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Fix exceptions thrown by LDiv/LMod helpers #98474
    arch-arm32, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT ARM64 SVE: Add FZ_2A, HG_2A, GZ_3A, GV_3A, GY_3*, DV_4A #98310
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve

Updated

  • Fix JitOptRepeat #94250
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Scalar/Packed conversions for floating point to integer #97529
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove remaining CRT PAL wrappers and enable including standard headers in the CoreCLR build #98336
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • [wasm] pinvoke improvements part 2 #98250
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Added more verbose error message when calling method using reflection and target type does not match passed type #98129
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Enable use-after-return checking in ASAN #89204
    area-Infrastructure
  • JIT: ARM64 SVE format encodings, `SVE_HX_3A_B` to `SVE_JL_3A` and `SVE_IC_3A` to `SVE_IC_3A_C` #98332
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Add ARM64 encodings for groups IF_SVE_CE,CF #98409
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'release/7.0-staging' #98455
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Forward the pgoinstrument argument to the inner build for VMR/Source-build builds #98446
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Convert the Remaining Legacy Tests to the Merged Wrapper Model #98469
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Add some linux-arm test coverage #98022
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • JIT: ARM64 SVE format encodings, `SVE_HY_3A` to `SVE_IB_3A` #98468
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • [mono][infra] Enable linux-x64 Mono fullAOT llvm job on extra platforms #92057
    blocked, area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Allow async interruptions on safepoints #95565
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Don't strip pointed-to type information in IL stubs #98392
    area-Interop-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [ILLink] Add interface implementing type to OverrideInformation and use where it makes sense #98274
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Support generic arguments for calli in CoreCLR #97079
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Faster IndexOfAny for IgnoreCase Ascii letters #96588
    area-System.Buffers, no-recent-activity, needs-author-action, 9.0.0
  • [release/6.0-staging] Send connection WINDOW_UPDATE before RTT PING #98385
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Http
  • [release/7.0-staging] Send connection WINDOW_UPDATE before RTT PING #98384
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Http
  • [release/8.0-staging] Send connection WINDOW_UPDATE before RTT PING #98383
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Http
  • [riscv64] fix linq MixedScope test #96671
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • JIT: Streaming mode for SPMI #98440
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Vectorize TensorPrimitives.PopCount #98281
    area-System.Numerics
  • [iOS] Introduce support for linking ICU libs #97216
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • [wasm][wasi] Throw error when WasmBuildNative is explicitly set to false during a single-file build #98087
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi
  • [mono] Block SIMD types in Swift interop #98429
    area-Interop-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Fixing SignedXml.CheckSignature for enveloped signature with `#xpointer(/)` Reference #95404
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • [browser][MT] deputy #98118
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] Add new test for multi-threading SignalR in Blazor WBT #98343
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono
  • Implement more ServicePoint properties #97537
    area-System.Net
  • JIT: Add scalar evolution analysis and do IV widening based on it #97865
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement HttpWebRequest AllowWriteStreamBuffering property #95001
    area-System.Net
  • Cse new candidate strategy #98467
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Privately expose MsQuic performance counters #98422
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Don't call user callbacks on MsQuic worker thread. #98361
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Add Read/Write Async test #98432
    area-System.Threading
  • Optimize BigInteger.Parse #97589
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Remove DAM from design-time attributes #98378
    area-System.ComponentModel, new-api-needs-documentation
